column1: Little Goat Diner////Oh how excited I was about this place when it first opened! Getting into Girl and the Goat was like trying to get a sit down for life advice from the Dalai Lama
column2: but when this little place opened
column3: I thought maybe there's a chance I can get at least a small taste of what the rave is all about. Sure
column4: I'd have to wait over an hour to get in
column5: but comparatively a one hour wait sure beats a one and half month wait. I was sold!
